title: New Patch error
body:
What in the world is this ** _error 004_ ** thing that keeps saying that it failed to download the new patch? I've tried restarting, reinstalling, and even going back to legacy and it still doesn't work... (btw: not sure if this is supposed to be in report a bug section or here)


EDIT: RESOLVED (I just reinstalled League 3 times)

replies.body: Riot please help me i cant play because eror 004. what i can do?

The **004 error** crops up if the patcher cannot maintain a solid connection to our patching servers. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help you resolve this, as it covers the most common solutions for problems reaching our servers.

Please let me know if this helped.
I've actually tried the hextech tool to no avail, but I shall try and read through the rest of the guide. Thank you for the reply.
does taht error message say something about 'installing the latest Directrix" or something like taht- I am also having this issue, no matter which client, new ro old, I am on
I don't think so, but I'm not sure. I'm currently reinstalling league, so I don't have any pics of the error. Hopefully both of our errors can be fixed lol.

Oh I would have loved to snip the image of the error I was having- so everyone could see it, but you know what. You could only see half of it. BECAUSE THE LOL ICON/BANNER WAS SMACK DAB IN THE MIDDLE OF IT, I'm really frustrated at this point, I know updates aren't without bugs and errors, but this is ridiculous, there are more errors and bugs rn than I have seen in a long time in any game.
yep... but unfortunately we obviously can't do anything except wait.

I don't know if this will help you but have you tried running LoL as an admin, i had an issue when I first started the game and my friend told me to do that, the thing opened up like it was supposed to, but of course that was way before this patch
I think I've tried that, but didn't work :(
